S.FORM: Samoa hya' ga cyux maki' tay 13 35 S, 172 20 W na Tayangco syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 2,831 sq km (maki' tay 178ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 2,821 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 10 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 198,926. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 12.40 , lhlahuy hya' ga 60.40 , sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 27.20 . spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Apia. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 1 na tay mtzyu' byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Tufuga Efi, aring ryax 11 squ byacing tay 5 sa kawas 2007 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la.
